messages.title: Shared Connection
messages.content:
[color=#FF9900]Hi there %username%,

It has come to my attention that you are sharing a connection with at least one other UNI player. Under the [url=https://board.en.ogame.gameforge.com/index.php?thread/712940-new-game-rules-valid-from-17-9-2012/&postID=6509030#post6509030]OGame.org Game Rules, Rule 2[/url] states that:

"[i]Each player is allowed to control a single account per universe. If two or more accounts are usually, occasionally, or permanently being played from the same network (e.g. schools, universities, Internet cafesâ€¦) [color=#FF0000][b]it is highly recommended to notify a GameOperator[/b][/color].[/i]"

As we have detected that this is the case, I would like to request that all involved accounts contact me via the [url=https://ogame.support.gameforge.com/en]support system[/url] within the next 72 hours to explain why multiple accounts have been detected on the same network, or [color=#FF0000][b]you may risk a ban on all accounts[/b][/color].

Thank you in advance for your co-operation.

Regards,
%adminname%
[img]%rank%[/img][/color]

messages.title: Warning For Insult
messages.content:
[color=#FF9900]Hi there %username%,

It has come to my attention you have been sending messages to other players which have been deemed to be insulting.

[url=https://board.en.ogame.gameforge.com/index.php?thread/712940-new-game-rules-valid-from-17-9-2012/&postID=6509036#post6509036]Rule 8 of the OGame.org Game Rules[/url] states that:

"[i]Any kind of insult and spam are not allowed.

- Anything that causes offense by being of an unacceptable quality that may hurt an individuals integrity is strictly forbidden.[/i]"

Please consider this a warning to keep your messages clean in future, as [color=#FF0000]further rule breaks may result in a ban[/color].

If you have any questions regarding this course of action, you may contact me on [url=https://discord.gg/ogame]Discord[/url] or by using the [url=https://ogame.support.gameforge.com/en]support system[/url].

Regards,
%adminname%
[img]%rank%[/img][/color]

messages.title: Warning For Non-English Messages
messages.content:
[color=#FF9900]Hi there %username%,

It has come to my attention you have been sending messages to other players in a non-English language.

[url=https://board.en.ogame.gameforge.com/index.php?thread/712940-new-game-rules-valid-from-17-9-2012/&postID=6509037#post6509037]Rule 9 of the OGame.org Game Rules[/url] states that:

"[i]The game publisher reserves the right to exclude players, who are not able to speak the respective native language (e.g. in Game, Board and Discord official chat-rooms). Other possibly allowed languages will be listed on the official game forum.

- The only official language in all the OGame.org services is English. Only use English language in game personal messages, game alliance pages, game alliance applications and game circular messages.[/i]"

Please consider this a warning to keep your messages in English in future, as [color=#FF0000]further rule breaks may result in a ban[/color].

If you have any questions regarding this course of action, you may contact me on [url=https://discord.gg/ogame]Discord[/url] or by using the [url=https://ogame.support.gameforge.com/en]support system[/url].

Regards,
%adminname%
[img]%rank%[/img][/color]

messages.title: Warning For Spam
messages.content:
[color=#FF9900]Hi there %username%,

It has come to my attention you have been sending a high number of espionages to another player which has been deemed to be spam.

[url=https://board.en.ogame.gameforge.com/index.php?thread/712940-new-game-rules-valid-from-17-9-2012/&postID=6509036#post6509036]Rule 8 of the OGame.org Game Rules[/url] states that:

"[i]Any kind of insult and spam are not allowed.

- Any situation intended to saturate a players interface through any method is forbidden. This includes but is not limited to: Personal Messages spam, Probes spam, Overview spam, Advertising other games or content[/i]"

Please consider this a warning, as [color=#FF0000]further rule breaks may result in a ban[/color].

If you have any questions regarding this course of action, you may contact me on [url=https://discord.gg/ogame]Discord[/url] or by using the [url=https://ogame.support.gameforge.com/en]support system[/url].

messages.title: Warning For T&C Breach
messages.content:
[color=#FF9900]Hi there %username%,

It has come to my attention you have been accessing your account via a VPN or proxy.

Point 3.2.5 of the [url=https://agbserver.gameforge.com/enGB-Terms-2014-OGame.html]GameForge Terms & Conditions[/url] states that:

"[i]It is not permissible to use the GameForge Services via anonymisation services or similar means capable of suppressing or concealing the real IP address or the origin of the user.[/i]"

You are kindly requested to stop accessing this account via a VPN/Proxy connection immediately. Please note that [color=#FF0000]failure to comply with this may result in a ban[/color] at our discretion.

If you have any questions regarding this course of action, you may contact me on [url=https://discord.gg/ogame]Discord[/url] or by using the [url=https://ogame.support.gameforge.com/en]support system[/url].

Regards,
%adminname%
[img]%rank%[/img][/color]
